Split the video into a smaller video

Parameters
originalVideooriginal video to split
nbPartnumber of the part
startHstart of the first video (hours)
startMstart of the first video (minutes)
startSstart of the first video (seconds)
endHend of the first video (hours)
endMend of the first video (minutes)
endSend of the first video (seconds)
Returns
the part of the video contained into the start time and the end time
